title: GTPN Website
text:
Global Tibetan Professionals Network (GTPN) is a platform where Tibetan professionals from diverse backgrounds can network with each other and find creative ways of contributing to the community. Through this network, Tibetan professionals around the world can share ideas, information and resources among themselves and with those aspiring to become like them through mentorship.
Launched on Nov 1, 2008 with support from Bureau of His Holiness the Dalai Lama, New Delhi, today GTPN has five active chapters: GTPN Delhi, Bangalore, Toronto, New York and London. There are currently 411 registered GTPN members.

title: GTPN Website
text:
VISION
To promote specialisation and professionalism among Tibetans to strengthen the Community

title: GTPN Website
text:
MISSION
To create a global network of Tibetan professionals and connect them with the community

title: GTPN Website
text:
OBJECTIVES
ENVISION’s main objectives for establishing the GTPN are as follows:
To create a global network of Tibetan professionals and connect them with the community To identify and promote Tibetans who have achieved success in different professions as role models To promote the involvement of Tibetan professionals in sustaining Tibetan identify and strengthening the Tibetan voice

title: GTPN Website
text:
WHY JOIN GTPN?
Networking opportunities GTPN membership will provide a platform for Tibetan professionals to network with others sharing similar career interests and challenges as well as those in different fields. Tibetan professionals can benefit from each other by exchange of ideas, information and resources. The skills, knowledge and experiences of the successful Tibetan professionals will be a resource to the younger professionals.

title: GTPN Website
section: Connect and contribute to the community
text:
Connect and contribute to the community
Due to lack of a proper channel of communication, many Tibetan professionals wishing to contribute to the community do not know where to begin. GTPN can connect them to the community as well as support their involvement in community development.
One of the specific ways in which the professionals can help the community is by mentoring younger Tibetans interested in similar career lines. Mentoring can happen one on one and also through meetings and workshops.
GTPN can also establish links with the Central Tibetan Administration in Dharamshala as well as other Tibetan institutes and schools to explore other ways of contributing to the community

title: GTPN Website
text:
Conferences and Event
Chapters organise networking events where members meet to exchange ideas, resources and have discussions on relevant topics.
ENVISION which serves as the umbrella body for GTPN will facilitate conferences and events from time to time where GTPN members will be invited. These events will serve as a great opportunity for networking and sharing resources with other professionals.
Check our Events Page for upcoming events and more information.

title: GTPN Website
section: Who is eligible for GTPN membership?
text:
Who is eligible for GTPN membership?
Any Tibetan professional willing to share ideas, information and resources with other Tibetan professionals Any Tibetan professional with a deep sense of commitment to contribute to the community WHO IS A PROFESSIONAL? - A person who is into a body of knowledge which requires a certain skill-set and which has been acquired through, either academic qualification or experience over a period of time.

title: GTPN Website
text:
FUTURE GOALS
Create various professional forums to draw upon the skills and experiences of Tibetan professionals Provide platforms for Tibetan professionals to come together to exchange ideas and resources as well as to contribute to the community.

text:

title: Events
text:
We are proud to be hosting the first Hackathon for the Tibetan community in the U.S.A. While this event is directed to catering the Tibetan Commnity, everyone is welcome to join!
For more information, visit the Hackathon Website

title: Events
text:
Networking Events
GTPN is excited to announce that we host networking events for professional at the last Thursday of every month! To get the most updated informatino about all the GTPN events, follow us on instagram! [!(assets/instagram_icon.png){width=100 fig-align=“left”}]
